title: Garland County jail inmates undergo substance abuse program
text: HOT SPRINGS, Ark. (AP) â€” Touted to transcend warmed over brick-and-mortar approaches to community safety, the new Garland County Detention Center and its $42 million price tag were sold to the public on the premise it would do more than warehouse inmates.
